EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow in Manila!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop. We look forward to seeing you tomorrow, October 14 in Manila.
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Big Data Roadshow
Wednesday, October 14, 2015
8:30am - 2:00pm (breakfast & lunch will be provided) Workshop Agenda > <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/manila>
Discovery Primea Hotel 6749 Ayala Ave
Makati
1226 Metro Manila Philippines Maps & Directions > <https://www.google.com/maps/place/Discovery+Primea/@14.553381,121.026953,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0xe5a79db1e0971c10?sa=X&ved=0CJsBEPwSMAtqFQoTCMSU6PmxtsgCFQnSYwodkukO1A>
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands On Section
- VMware Player. Suggestions: VMware Player (Windows) OR VMware Fusion (MacOS). - RDP Client. Suggestions: coRD (MacOS), rDesktop (linux), Microsoft RDP (Windows)
*Access to VM instance will be provided
QUESTIONS? Please email Rushenka Perera at rperera@pivotal.io <mailto:rperera@pivotal.io>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team
P.S. - Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in joining you, please forward this link to the workshop details & registration <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/manila>
